title: GIVE MONEY VIA OPENING TABS IN BRAND NEW LEAGUE OF LEGENDS GROUP!!!

embed.description: Tab for a Cause is a charitable organization that donates advertising revenue to causes around the world. Giving to your cause is as easy as surfing the web.

body: Come on guys, let's prove that we truly aren't as toxic as people say. Just because our wildlife is likely to kill us, should not mean that we don't help those in need. That isn't the ANZAC way. We should follow the legacy that they left behind: Justice and equality for all, no matter their race, economic status, religion or otherwise. WE CAN DO THIS!

replies.body: Just noticed how deep I got with that. Sorry for the emotional journey that I just took you all on.
